title: Can't lock in my Picks for worlds
body: Every time I click on one of the group it wont let me lock in the same message keeps saying "THERE WAS AN ERROR:INTERNAL SERVER ERROR"

replies.body: If you're trying to lock in your choices today, then unfortunately you're out of luck. The World's Pick'Em is locked now, as the first game of the quarterfinals was today and has already ended.

As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, you would have had to lock in your picks prior to the quarterfinals matches starting. Locking them in after the matches have already started would be unfair. >.<

Let me know if you have any other questions.
